Text:
Somehow, I kind of doubt Carlos Estevez, son of Ramon Antonio Gerard Estevez, is Jewish. Perhaps his mother, the former Janet Elizabeth Templeton, is Jewish but I've seen no indication the kids were raised as anything other than Catholic. In fact, the name Sheen was drawn from Bishop Fulton Sheen for the elder Estevez's stage name. 

A simpler explanation is that stupid crazy people are drawn to wealthy celebrities who also happen to be stupid crazy people.

Since "Jewishness" is transmitted from the mother, it is possible that he is technically "Jewish."

What's your point?  Anyone with any Jewish blood is a Zionist?  Dirty little secret...there are many practicing (as well as secular) Jews who are opposed to Zionism.

Ed. to add...

I doubt that a Roman Catholic Mexican is a secret Zionist.

No, Sheen being Jewish is just another piece of evidence to add to the growing list of Jewish connections AJ has.

And by the way, those supposedly Anti-Zionist Jews you boast of are not technically anti-Zionist. You see, "Jews Against Zionism" don't oppose Zionism itself, they oppose the current Zionist state of Israel. As for some other Zionist state in the future, nobody knows if they would oppose that.

NAZI ANTI SEMITES ARE SO STUPID COWS. THEY WILL SAY ANYTHING AND REPEAT ANYTHING BECAUSE THEY BELIEVE, PROBLEM IS THEY ARE DEFEATED. 95%+ OF ALL JEWS ARE SIONISTS. TIMMYS MOTHER WAS A JEW, SHE WAS ALSO THE TOWN HUER. POOR LITTLE NAZI! WE SIMPLY HAVE THE GUNS AND YOU DONT, SO NAZI TIMMY EAT MY JEWISHSHlT !
